sentences.sentence: This paper reports the hibernation state of Gekko stvinhonis in the aspects of ecology and morphophysiology.
sentences.translation: 本文研究了无蹼壁虎冬眠期的生态和形态生理状况。

sentences.sentence: Gekko has been developing its technology and service over the last year.
sentences.translation: 去年一整年，Gekko一直致力于开发这项技术和服务。

sentences.sentence: Half-reformed after prison, Gekko is more anti-hero than villain this time.
sentences.translation: 在监狱中劳改了一半后，这次盖戈更像是个平凡的角色，而不是混蛋。
